CONTRACT_ID: On the Nature of the Data Provided Notethe provided data is primarily in the JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) format. As such, the most effective way to output this data, per your request, will be to reformat the json, while retaining its order.
full_summary:
================

### Request for Proposal: Cross-Country Ski Trail Groomer

#### Tender Details

| Details | English | French |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS3744667712 | JS37444677712 |
| Amendment Number | 2 | 2 |
| Tender Closing Date | December 7, 2022, 2:00 PM EST | 7 décembre 2022 14:00 HNE |
| Expected Contract Start Date | Not specified | Non spécifié |
| Expected Contract End Date | Not specified | Non spécifié |
| Procurement Category | Goods and Services (GD) | Biens et services (SB) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding | Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumission |

####Scope

Parks Canada Agency (PC) is seeking a new cross-country ski trail groomer and ancillary items. The requirements are outlined in the ANNEX A, dated November 14, 2022, and the pricing information is described in ANNEX B. Delivery is expected to occur by March 31, 2023.

####Contact

For all tender inquiries, please contact:

* Raphael Lafontaine (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: None
	+ Fax: None
	+ Address: None

####Countries of Delivery

Goods and services will be delivered in Canada.

#### CPRC-Based Agreements

This tender notice applies to the following Canada-wide trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

####Reference and Attachments

This notice may be accessed through Ariba Discovery at this link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/
